Field.DisplayName: マップに当たらない
Field.Description: Do not hit the map while ON.

Field.DisplayName: 通常の敵に当たらない
Field.Description: When ON, do not make contact with other enemies, only see the hit with the player.

Field.Def: u8 Target is the player only = 0
Field.DisplayName: ターゲットは自機のみ

Field.Def: u8 Works only within its own site = 0
Field.DisplayName: 自機のサイト内でしか動かない
Field.Description: Earn calculation time by making it work only within its own site. Can be used in combination with "Distance to disable control"

Field.DisplayName: IKを使用しない

Field.Def: u8 Percentage of bullets that do not hit = 0
Field.DisplayName: あたり無し弾丸含有率
Field.Description: Set the rate of bullets that do not hit when shooting.

Field.Def: u8 Do not use joint control. = 0
Field.DisplayName: 関節制御を使用しない
アニメーションしない
Field.Description: Do not fully animate the enemy.

Field.DisplayName: 制御を無効化する距離
ＳＦＸに当たらない

Field.Def: u8 It does not correspond to the SFX of the viewpoint = 0
Field.DisplayName: 見方のSFXにあたらない
Field.Description: It does not correspond to the SFX of the viewpoint.

Field.DisplayName: 自機に当たらない
Field.Description: The enemy does not damage itself.

Field.Def: u8 Able to ride on moving objects = 0
Field.DisplayName: 動くものに乗れるようにする。
Field.Description: Setting this flag allows enemies to ride on moving objects. (Too heavy for raycasting)

Field.DisplayName: オートブースト更新間隔
ＡI同期スキップフレーム
Field.Description: Interval at which information is passed from the control side to the AI side.

Field.Def: u8 Number of frames to skip AI manipulation = 10
Field.DisplayName: AIの操作をスキップするフレーム数
Field.Description: Interval for interpreting operations on the AI side.

Field.DisplayName: Fcsのターゲット検索の間隔（フレーム）
関節制御の更新間隔

Field.Def: u8 Decimated frames for IK collision judgment = 5
Field.DisplayName: IK用の当たり判定の間引きフレーム
Field.Description: Decimated frames for IK collision judgment.

Field.DisplayName: ロックの遮蔽チェックを行わない

Field.Def: u8 Destroy even in the air = 0
Field.DisplayName: 空中にいても、破壊する
